scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ generated/ config/addresses.ts config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.yaml src/types/*
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 dex-subgraph subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:k8s:apothem: graph deploy --node http://apothem-graph-node-service:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs-service:5001 --version-label v0.0.1 dex-subgraph
scripts.prep:apothem:dev: yarn clean && yarn prep:addresses:apothem && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.prep:xinfin:xinfin: yarn clean && yarn prep:addresses:xinfin && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen && graph build
